column1: Do you want some acid?
Agh! I'm so bored.
Huh?
Wow! Someone from the past is on the line!  Hello? Is there a refrigierator running? Well then, you'd better go catch it!
Where did it go? Do you see where it went?
Whatever, Dracula, why don't you turn into a bat or something?
It went this way?
"Shouldn't we be worried if our school president is a girl who would rather get her tits licked than go to student council meetings?"
Wull what do you mean?
Those two should just screw and get it over with!
I just want you to know that I have a hure crush on you and-  HEY!
Oh hey, Kenny. Who's this?
What are you talking about? The poor kid at this school is Jacob Hallery.
Did he do stuff like this at your old school?
Okay. Hold it there. Okay. That's good, don't move.
Oh God. Faith Hilling is so February 2012.
Yeah, that's good. Now go back the other way.
He's not Taylor Swifting, that's old stuff.
If you guys wanna keep Faith Hilling, I'm sure people are still doing it at the old folks home.
Wow, what's this?
Wow! He can bowl.
Shut up, bitch!
Sometimes he's firm.
Yes, Mommy.
Yes, Mommy.
We're gonna sneak a tooth under this rich kid's pillow, then come back and collect the tooth fairy money that his parents leave him.
Look, this is our turf! You'd better scram before the Boss breaks your legs!
Alright, that does it! Come on, we're going to see the Boss!
Loogie.
Right on our turf, Boss! I ain't ever seen that kind of disre-  Erp.
Ha! You guys don't even know how the tooth trade works!
Rowwr!
Alright, kid. Time to die.
Woohoo, let's go sledding, let's go race and race, let's go!
Wwaaahahahahaaha
They tricked us again, huh?
They always get us. Sometimes it's a ice cream truck, sometimes it's a taco stand. But they always fool us.
I shall put the magic spell on you!
